thread.title: Podcast: Are 7 trends from the Jazz preseason real or illusion?
thread.title_full: Podcast: Are 7 trends from the Jazz preseason real or illusion?

title: Podcast: Are 7 trends from the Jazz preseason real or illusion?
text:
That's what host Andy Larsen and guest Ben Dowsett try to tackle on this episode of the KSL Court Report. What trends from the Jazz's 7 early games are real, and which can you safely ignore? 
We discuss Trey Burke's excellent play, the rebounding fall of Rudy Gobert, the Jazz playing small lineups, and four other issues from this preseason. 
The KSL Court Report is a new 20-minute-per-episode podcast on KSL.com, hosted by Utah Jazz beat writer Andy Larsen. The podcast is designed to fit into the average commute while still fitting in quality analysis on the Jazz topic of the day. 
You can listen to the podcast below, and subscribe on your mobile device on iTunes or Stitcher Radio .
